title: a death match mod (like every games or dota) "ascension"

embed.description: Ascension gamemode got upgraded for this year in League of Legends! ►OLD ASCENSION: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G9udnlBvJi0 ►►Subscribe to Bring It In: http://bit.ly/Brofresco ● LIVESTREAM: http://www.twitch.tv/brofresco I stream EVERY SUNDAY at 5PM CET! STALK ME! EXTRA-FRESCO: ● Snapchat: brofresco ● Twitter: https://twitter.com/Brofresco ● Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/brofresco ● Facebook: http://www.fb.com/brofrescoyt ● Instagram: http://instagram.com/brofresco

body:
{{champion:101}} ascension is a fun game mode of league of legend(better since it's rework),  it's like a deathmatch like every other games, it used too provide free fights without carring about the towers or the minions, first seconds of game solo or team fught, it's up to you, no lanes and meta too choose, just a good team comp and some teamplay in order too "tryhard" you can kill the xerath too to become the mastodonte, the allmighty witch is fun.
so guys if you like the idea upvote and most important leave a comment about what you think about a deathmatch mod(ascension is the most alike mode for that).
love, an old beta player still playing your game
